channel.title: junypr berries (Posts about when you feel completely out of control like everyone sees straight through you)

item.title: Taxidermy
item.dc:creator: Alex Ding
item.description:
I am a bird sliced
needle-thin beak to tail
ruby guts spilling
blood darkening the
scarlet feathers at my throat
heart torn out
emerald wings pinned in place
preserved perfection
I'll stay here forever
another specimen for your collection
item.category: when you feel completely out of control like everyone sees straight through you
